entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • INamespaceOrTypeSymbol.GetTypeMembers does not return all type members. #59517
  • ID0056 bad suggestion in netstandard2.0 #59514
  • IDE0064: Update analyzer title and associated doc #59513
  • Compiler doesn't show warning about not exhaustive switch expression #59511

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4 doesn't work on .NETStandard 2.0 #59515
  • Event handler tab-completion does not work in new project templates #59488
  • Incremental source generator not called in production build context #59487

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IBoundSwitchStatement #59516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ts lsp externalaccess 2 #59510
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE, Next
  • NavigationOptions refactoring #59505
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only subscribe to ActiveDocumentChanged if solution cralwer is enabled #59498
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status for pattern matching on ReadOnlySpan<char> #59497
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements" #59492
    Area-IDE
